actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a program providing for the inspection of fish produced on fish farms in the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a continuing program providing for the inspection of fish produced on fish farms in the United States. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a program providing for the inspection of fish produced on fish farms in the United States.
